title: Implement AI-powered story enhancement validation system
description: Develop automated validation system that uses AI to analyze user stories and provide INVEST compliance feedback with specific improvement suggestions
iWant: AI-powered validation that checks INVEST compliance and suggests improvements
soThat: I can ensure all user stories meet quality standards before development begins
acceptanceCriteria: AI validates story against INVEST criteria within 2 seconds
System provides specific improvement suggestions for failing criteria
Validation results display confidence scores for each INVEST dimension
Enhanced stories are marked with timestamp and enhancement flag
